医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ZEST 试验未能达到乳腺癌 ctDNA 检测的入组目标根据圣安东尼奥乳腺癌研讨会上公布的结果，ZEST 临床试验旨在评估 niraparib (Zejula) 预防循环肿瘤 DNA (ctDNA) 患者乳腺癌复发的作用，但未能吸引足够多的 ctDNA 阳性患者。 SABCS），于 2024 年 12 月 10 日至 13 日举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/ZEST-Trial-fails-to-meet-enrollment-goals-for-ctDNA-testing-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/ZEST-trial-fails-to-meet-enrollment-goals-for-ctDNA-testing-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16d5b794-7c2e-4ac7-9908-a3eb9f7c80d5 Sat, 14 Dec 2024 06:46:15 -0500 ZEST trial fails to meet enrollment goals for ctDNA testing in breast cancer
研究揭示前列腺癌失控生长背后的关键机制威尔康奈尔医学研究人员表示，前列腺癌劫持了正常前列腺的生长调节程序，以释放刹车并自由生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/Study-unveils-key-mechanism-behind-prostate-cancers-uncontrol-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/Study-unveils-key-mechanism-behind-prostate-cancers-uncontrol-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c9803c2-0717-44f8-9765-dbe65a9fa513 Sat, 14 Dec 2024 06:39:19 -0500 Study unveils key mechanism behind prostate cancer's uncontrolled growth
机器学习模型预测 CDK4/6 抑制剂对转移性乳腺癌的疗效结合临床和基因组因素的机器学习 (ML) 模型在预测哪些激素受体 (HR) 阳性、HER2 阴性转移性乳腺癌患者通过添加 CDK4/ 获得更好的结果方面优于仅基于临床或基因组数据的模型。根据 2024 年 12 月 10 日至 13 日举行的圣安东尼奥乳腺癌研讨会 (SABCS) 上公布的结果，内分泌治疗的 6 种抑制剂作为一线治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/Machine-learning-model-predicts-CDK46-inhibitor-effectness-in-metastatic-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/Machine-learning-model-predicts-CDK46-inhibitor-effectness-in-metastatic-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d04c2c7-f1e4-45b3-b8c6-9dbdf4a5be86 Sat, 14 Dec 2024 06:25:58 -0500 Machine learning model predicts CDK4/6 inhibitor effectiveness in metastatic breast cancer
靶向基因治疗关闭癌细胞的能量中心研究人员正在研究癌细胞的能量中心，以破坏这些能量来源并引发广泛的癌细胞死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/Targeted-gene-therapy-shuts-down-cancer-cells-energy-centers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/Targeted-gene-therapy-shuts-down-cancer-cells-energy-centers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a132453-c545-4478-878c-a46109f29de2 Sat, 14 Dec 2024 06:21:57 -0500 Targeted gene therapy shuts down cancer cells' energy centers
辅助蒽环类药物加紫杉烷类化疗方案可提高高危乳腺癌患者的生存率根据 OncotypeDX 基因组测试，具有高复发风险的早期、淋巴结阴性、激素受体 (HR) 阳性、HER2 阴性乳腺癌患者在接受辅助蒽环类药物加紫杉烷类化疗时具有更好的结果根据 2024 年 12 月 10 日至 13 日举行的圣安东尼奥乳腺癌研讨会 (SABCS) 上公布的结果，该方案与仅接受基于紫杉烷的辅助化疗方案的患者进行了比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/Adjuvant-anthracycline-plus-taxane-based-chemotherapy-regimen-improves-survival-in-high-risk-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/Adjuvant-anthracycline-plus-taxane-based-chemotherapy-regimen-improves-survival-in-high-risk-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1008df11-c56b-4559-a1d3-c77b499fea60 Sat, 14 Dec 2024 06:14:44 -0500 Adjuvant anthracycline- plus taxane-based chemotherapy regimen improves survival in high-risk breast cancer patients
TTUHSC 研究人员揭示了调节阿尔茨海默病基因表达的机制超过 600 万美国人患有阿尔茨海默病，这是一种以大脑内β-淀粉样蛋白积累为特征的痴呆症。 β淀粉样蛋白是一种相对较小的蛋白质，可在大脑中形成有毒斑块，从而导致阿尔茨海默病的有害影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/TTUHSC-researcher-to-uncover-mechanisms-that-regulate-gene-express-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/TTUHSC-researcher-to-uncover-mechanisms-that-regulate-gene-expression-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdd25489-1d46-465c-b59a-774d3f9df119 Sat, 14 Dec 2024 06:02:29 -0500 TTUHSC researcher to uncover mechanisms that regulate gene expression in Alzheimer's disease
了解南海海洋物种的病毒组成宣布在 Zoonoses 杂志上发表新文章。这项研究调查了与南海海洋生物相关的病毒多样性，以增进对该地区病毒生态系统的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/Understanding-viral-composition-in-marine-species-from-the-South-China-Sea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/Understanding-viral-composition-in-marine-species-from-the-South-China-Sea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c4f6099-3bd8-49c8-ad09-327cd26fbed6 Sat, 14 Dec 2024 05:51:22 -0500 Understanding viral composition in marine species from the South China Sea
CNIC团队开发了一整套遗传工具和小鼠品系国家心血管研究中心 (CNIC) 的一个团队开发了一套全面的创新遗传工具和小鼠品系，称为 iFlpMosaics，旨在加强基因功能及其对健康和疾病影响的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/CNIC-team-develops-a-compressive-set-of-genic-tools-and-mouse-lines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241214/CNIC-team-develops-a-compressive-set-of-genic-tools-and-mouse-lines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c702add9-03c8-45a7-8ca6-e4e22033864c Sat, 14 Dec 2024 05:46:01 -0500 CNIC team develops a comprehensive set of genetic tools and mouse lines
探索新隐托平衍生物抗癌的细胞毒性潜力宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。癌症一直是一个严重的公共卫生和社会问题，是一种降低生活质量的主要疾病，也是提高预期寿命的障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Exploring-the-cyto毒-潜在-of-neocryptolepine-derivatives-against-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Exploring-the-cyto毒-潜在-of-neocryptolepine-derivatives-against-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c48d05a2-5769-4450-876f-297727d6ebc0 Fri, 13 Dec 2024 23:49:00 -0500 Exploring the cytotoxic potential of neocryptolepine derivatives against cancer
泽奇展现出现代医学的多功能治疗潜力宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。泽奇（Euphorbia helioscopia L.）是大戟科大戟属分布广泛的植物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Zeqi-exhibits-multifunction-therapeutic-pottial-in-modern-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Zeqi-exhibits-multifunction-therapeutic-potial-in-modern-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13fee860-c65d-4f2d-838c-526c9c1ea3cc Fri, 13 Dec 2024 23:38:00 -0500 Zeqi exhibits multifunctional therapeutic potential in modern medicine
